title: Slicing a Sparse Tensor?
body_html: Currently, sparse tensors don't support indexing, and the tf.sparse_split() operation can't split a sparse tensor according to a given proportion. If I want to select a portion of the training set (which is a sparse tensor) as the validation set, is it possible?
body_text: Currently, sparse tensors don't support indexing, and the tf.sparse_split() operation can't split a sparse tensor according to a given proportion. If I want to select a portion of the training set (which is a sparse tensor) as the validation set, is it possible?
body: Currently, sparse tensors don't support indexing, and the tf.sparse_split() operation can't split a sparse tensor according to a given proportion. If I want to select a portion of the training set (which is a sparse tensor) as the validation set, is it possible?
